messages.content: How many times does the letter "n" appear in the word "mayonnaise"?
The letter "n" appears 2 times in the word "mayonnaise".
Can you list each of them?

Certainly! In the word "mayonnaise", the first "n" is the 6th letter, and the second "n" is the 7th letter. Here's the breakdown: 

1. m
2. a
3. y
4. o
5. n
6. n (1st occurrence)
7. n (2nd occurrence)
8. a
9. i
10. s
11. e
